extendedInfo.description: The original and still the best! Do not be fooled by all the cheap imitations!Show your iPhone friends an app they'll never get! Inhale on the phone mic to smoke! Great at parties!IF YOU HAVE TROUBLE DOWNLOADING or any other issues please check our website (at the link below) for solutions, or EMAIL US. If you just leave a comment we have no way to contact you for details. We reply ASAP!* 12 real strains of weed!* 12 different grinders* 12 kinds of rolling papers* 11 kinds of lighters and matches* Roach clip and filter tips!* Fastest Roll mode! Compete with your friends for the best time!* BLUNTS! Split it, unroll it, dump the tobacco, fill it with weed, roll it, and smoke it!* 4/20 update! Blow out short breaths for smoke rings!* Multi-touch* The app comes with many items to start with (same as always). If you can't get enough, now even more items can be purchased in-app. The extra items are very inexpensive.Check out the gameplay video at link below!* Drag a bud from the bag, break it up, line it up on the paper, roll it up and twist the ends!* Then spark it up and smoke it! Inhale on the phone mic to smoke, then blow on the phone to exhale smoke onto the screen. Blow short breaths for smoke rings!* Shake the phone to ash it, or tap the ash with your finger to knock it off* The smoke always rises upward. Change the phone orientation to try it* Installable to SD card (Froyo and later)Check out our other apps, Smoke A Bowl and Nose Candy! And like our Facebook page to get cheat codes and see what's next!pot,420,blunt,bong,virtual,drugs,marijuana,cannabis

reviews.title: One thing
reviews.comment: Be able to smoke a bong, then it\'d be the best app ever. Possibly more greens choices? Dutch passion, ect.
reviews.author: Brett Walker

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: I just have to say wow. The HD update is awesome
reviews.author: Tyler Wintringham

reviews.title: Android ap
reviews.comment: Oh this app is active all my friends have iphones ill keep my android
reviews.author: Euridicye Davis

reviews.title: Used to be good
reviews.comment: And another onebites the dust. Here goes another developer charging inapp purchaes for a game that must be purchased in the first place DONT BUY
reviews.author: Matt Ginis

reviews.title: Fun game because of the bud u can pick the paper nd lighters
reviews.comment: I just love this game real shyt every body should buy
reviews.author: Deven Bacchus

reviews.title: Ganjaa
reviews.comment: Chill app, people need to stop complaining about the recent purchasable content that was added, you can buy 90% of it for a dollar and obviously game developers need to get paid just like the rest of us
reviews.author: Brice Matthews

reviews.title: Not a favorite anymore!!
reviews.comment: I loved thus game and I still do but I hate how you\'re making us pay for coins to get other items. I want the stuff you added but it\'s hard to get when I don\'t even have a credit card. I really think you guys should consider adding a way to earn coins in the game cause that would be so much better and you would make a lot more people happier with the app! You should also add more good bud to this app and smoke a bowl. Thanks
reviews.author: Daniel Brennan

reviews.title: Coolio
reviews.comment: Converted to 5 stars for snappy customer support. My advice is to not reinstall you will lose your coin purchases. If you end up having to just contact customer support and they\'ll get them back quick.
reviews.author: Trey Mattingly

reviews.title: Great App!
reviews.comment: High-ly recommended! Fun app. Lots of options.
reviews.author: Troy Haats

reviews.title: This is fantastic!!
reviews.comment: Well this one this greatest I\'ve bought. I showed this to my friends and they were amazed too. I paid for the app and bought all the extras I paid for the 1,000 coins and was able to buy everything. And for these who think it\'s greedy I don\'t think let me explain. See it takes money to develop these extras and that money has to come from somewhere. Now I think paying is fine until you cross the line where your app starts to be over 3 bucks per extra so if I paid over 10 bucks I\'d be mad too.
reviews.author: Matt Cowan

reviews.title: Really fun
reviews.comment: I greatly enjoy showing my friends this app. We alo try to beat each others times.. the only real issue I have is that when doing fastest roll you have to wait for the game to tell you what to do. It takes up unneeded time for that. I can do it in 21sec. But if those stupid pop up directions did not hold you up. I could do it even faster. Please fix this and it will be 5 stars.
reviews.author: Thomas Rinaldo

reviews.title: So addictive
reviews.comment: Great little game, attractive to look at and the smoking/burning effects are great so its really satisfying to smoke your perfectly rolled joint. The latest update adds loads of variety ; yes there are micro transactions but for \302\2430.75 you can get like 3 new papers, lighters and 1 or 2 new grinders so its  a great deal. Epic game  oh and its fun to see how much $ worth of weed you\'ve smoked in the stats page :)
reviews.author: adam smith

reviews.title: I want my coins back
reviews.comment: I got a different phone because my power button got messed up and now all my coins are gone after I bought 3000
reviews.author: Cameron Miller

reviews.title: Dis game is awesome
reviews.comment: I luv dis game
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Weed
reviews.comment: G just payed for game now they like to have more money for the updates. Not a happy bunny
reviews.author: chris cooke

reviews.title: NOT A HAPPY CUSTOMER
reviews.comment: \"I\'ve never rated a app before this one but this app is my all time favorite. If I could I would buy it all over again\

reviews.title: No sound!?!?!
reviews.comment: Awesome app overall but no sound? I\'ve played this app before and it had sound...?
reviews.author: David Ramos

reviews.title: Worth every dime
reviews.comment: I\'ve had this app for a couple years its a great way to entertain your Stoner buds and occupy your time when bored, buy like everyday you see someone smoking from their phone good work
reviews.author: Nick Grace

reviews.title: 420 fun! ;)
reviews.comment: Hehe this game is a lot of fun!.keeps me.busy for a while. I love the new items for only 99cents I am able to buy the other grinders and papers!
reviews.author: Majoyree Smalls

reviews.title: Bit dated now
reviews.comment: Wish i hadn\'t bought it now.. the new game out called Reefer is WAY BETTER and doesn\'t charge for in game items.
reviews.author: Nick Carter
